name: Oh, to be Yeti!
description:
A short horror / spooky game built in under 48 hours for the GMTK GameJam - https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-jam

Survive each level by avoiding the Yetis and reaching the end goal - a marked, glowing gravestone. 

This build is for Windows.

Made by myself (c00pala) and JasonBlair.

YouTube channels:

https://www.youtube.com/user/c00pala

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCFm6LyGN1CFEw9XncGvtmuQ

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
CORRECTION TO CONTROLS:

I (c00p) stuffed up the input controls because I was rushing at the end of the jam.
Esc doesn't quit the game but N or M will.... don't ask.

In the spirit of the competition and to ensure honesty, I've left the build as-is for judging, etc. I'll upload a fixed build after it's over.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Thanks for checking it out! =)
